metadata.title: USN-6005-1 -- Sudo vulnerabilities
metadata.description: Matthieu Barjole and Victor Cutillas discovered that Sudo incorrectly escaped control characters in log messages and sudoreplay output. An attacker could possibly use these issues to inject terminal control characters that alter output when being viewed.  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-6005-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  sudo-ldap - 1.8.21p2-3ubuntu1.6 sudo - 1.8.21p2-3ubuntu1.6 No subscription required
